Package com.imperial_net.inventioryApp.providers.service

Class ProviderService

java.lang.Object
com.imperial_net.inventioryApp.providers.service.ProviderService
@Service public class ProviderService extends Object
Servicio encargado de la lógica de negocio relacionada con proveedores.
